oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oikos - Økologisk Norge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oikos is a Norwegian non-governmental member organisation for the promotion of organic food and farming. Having regional and local brands throughout Norway, its members are both organic farmers and consumers. The work areas are policy and advocay, information and media work, as well as marketing work.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Organization} Oikos - Økologisk Norge. [Oikos - Organic Norway.] Organization Leader(s): Andestad, Mr Reidar and Bjerkem, Mr Jakob.
